column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////i came here for a really late dinner on fri night.  our reservation was at 10
column3: since i was on CA time anyway.  3 of us shared the shrimp cocktail
column9: and elote corn.  everything was delicious
column10: especially the pork chop and corn.  as if this wasn't enough
column11: we got the chocolate cream pie to share at the end
